Package org.codehaus.preon.util

The package providing some utility classes, supporting the construction of Codecs.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ContextResolver<T>  
EvenlyDistributedLazyList.CodecExceptionPolicy<E> The problem with lazy loading data is that the exception occurs not while calling the decode operation on the Codec, but later on, while obtaining the data.
LazyLoadingReference.Loader<T> The interface to be implemented when loading instances of T.
 

Class Summary
AnnotationUtils  
AnnotationWrapper  
CaseCorrectingParaBuilder<T>  
CodecDescriptorHolder  
DocumentParaContents  
EmptyAnnotatedElement  
EnumUtils  
EvenlyDistributedLazyList<E> A List that will lazily load objects from a BitBuffer.
HidingAnnotatedElement A wrapper of AnnotatedElements, hiding certain annotations.
LazyLoadingReference<T> A reference to a an instance of type T, to be dynamically loaded, on demand, whenever the reference is resolved by calling LazyLoadingReference.get(); once loaded, the reference will hold on to the instance of T until the garbage collector collects it.
ParaContentsDocument  
ReplacingAnnotatedElement An AnnotatedElement wrapper, replacing one of the annotations with another one.
TextUtils A collection of text utilities.
UnevenlyDistributedLazyList<E> A List implementation that will lazy load its elements.
 

Package org.codehaus.preon.util Description

The package providing some utility classes, supporting the construction of Codecs.
